Class Form

java.lang.Object

public class Form
extends LinearLayout

Form ViewGroup for simplifying form validation, encoding, and actions.

Field Detail

validate

protected boolean validate
true if the form should validate (default). Otherwise false.

action

protected java.lang.String action
Name of the method in the view's context to call. Parameters include this Form and the boolean specifying if it succeeded to validate.

debug

protected boolean debug
true to print debug info. Otherwise false.

getterFields

protected  getterFields
Getter fields used to get the state of the input. Used for validation.

requiredFields

protected  requiredFields
Form children that are marked as required. Used for validation

childNames

protected  childNames
Names of the form children. Used for URL encoding via serialize().
